Name: Kirkland's, Inc
Description: Kirkland's, Inc. operates as a specialty retailer of home dcor in the United States. The company's stores provide various merchandise, including holiday dcor, furniture, ornamental wall dcor, decorative accessories, art, textiles, mirrors, fragrance and accessories, lamps, artificial floral products, housewares, outdoor living items, gifts, and frames. Its stores also offer an assortment of holiday merchandise in seasonal periods. The company operates its stores under the Kirkland's, Kirkland's Home, Kirkland's Home Outlet, Kirkland's Outlet, and The Kirkland Collection names. As of March 19, 2020, it operated 432 stores in 36 states, as well as an e-commerce enabled Website, kirklands.com. Kirkland's, Inc. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Brentwood, Tennessee.
Address: 5310 Maryland Way, Brentwood, TN, United States, 37027
